statements: SELECT * FROM efficiency_data WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT efficiency_percentage FROM efficiency_data WHERE efficiency_percentage > 0.85;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, efficiency_percentage FROM efficiency_data ORDER BY efficiency_percentage ASC;
SELECT AVG(efficiency_percentage) AS avg_efficiency FROM efficiency_data;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, equipment_id ASC, efficiency_percentage DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(efficiency_percentage) AS avg_efficiency FROM efficiency_data GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING avg_efficiency > 80 ORDER BY avg_efficiency DESC
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(efficiency_percentage) AS total_efficiency FROM efficiency_data WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY total_efficiency DESC
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM efficiency_data GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING records_count > 5 ORDER BY records_count ASC
SELECT * FROM efficiency_data WHERE efficiency_percentage BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT * FROM gasification_equipment_performance;
SELECT equipment_id, efficiency, date FROM gasification_equipment_performance;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM equipment_details;
SELECT equipment_id, manufacturer, model, production_year FROM equipment_details;
SELECT efficiency, equipment_id, date FROM gasification_equipment_performance ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_id, efficiency FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.9 ORDER BY efficiency ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, production_year FROM equipment_details WHERE production_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM gasification_equipment_performance GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING avg_efficiency < 0.8;

SELECT e.equipment_id, e.manufacturer, g.efficiency FROM equipment_details e JOIN gasification_equipment_performance g ON e.equipment_id = g.equipment_id WHERE g.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY g.efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM GasificationEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM GasificationEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Furnace';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM GasificationEquipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE efficiency > 80 AND pressure < 100;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM EquipmentLogs WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GasificationEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM GasificationEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Gasifier';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM EquipmentLogs WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(temperature) FROM PerformanceData GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM gasification_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM gasification_equipment;
SELECT id, equipment_name, installation_date FROM gasification_equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT performance_date, efficiency, pressure FROM performance_data WHERE efficiency > 0.75;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM gasification_equipment WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, efficiency, pressure FROM gasification_equipment JOIN performance_data ON gasification_equipment.id = performance_data.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM gasification_equipment JOIN equipment_status ON gasification_equipment.id = equipment_status.equipment_id WHERE status = 'Operational';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM gasification_equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON gasification_equipment.id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM gasification_equipment_performance;
SELECT equipment_id, efficiency_rating FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE temperature > 500;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, year_manufactured FROM equipment_details ORDER BY year_manufactured DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM performance_history WHERE output_power > 100 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, year_manufactured FROM equipment_details WHERE year_manufactured < 2015 ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT maintenance_type, technician, comments FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01' AND maintenance_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, performance_date, output_power FROM performance_history WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY output_power DESC, performance_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM equipment_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company') ORDER BY sensor_value DESC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
